mapper.select: SELECT A.TASK_NO , D.SUB_TASK_NO , A.MAIL_TITLE , A.TASK_NM , A.MAIL_TITLE , B.CAMP_NM , C.SEG_NM , D.SEND_DT , D.END_DT , E.CD_NM CAMP_TY , A.SEND_REPEAT FROM NEO_TASK A , NEO_CAMPAIGN B , NEO_SEGMENT C , NEO_SUBTASK D , (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C004' AND UILANG = #{uilang} AND USE_YN = 'Y') E WHERE A.CAMP_NO = B.CAMP_NO AND A.SEG_NO = C.SEG_NO AND A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO AND A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND D.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND A.CAMP_TY = E.CD

SELECT A.STEP1 , A.STEP2 , COALESCE(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2 , A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A, ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B ON A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1 AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2 ORDER BY A.STEP1, A.STEP2

SELECT AA.STEP1 , AA.NM_STEP1 , AA.CNT_STEP1 , CASE WHEN AA.STEP1 = '001' THEN 6 ELSE 8 END STEP1_ROWSPAN , BB.STEP2 , BB.NM_STEP2 , BB.CNT_STEP2 , 1 STEP2_ROWSPAN , CC.RCODE_STEP3 AS STEP3 , COALESCE(CC.NM_STEP3,'') AS NM_STEP3 , COALESCE(CC.CNT_STEP3,0) AS CNT_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.STEP1, COALESCE(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP1, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP1 FROM (SELECT STEP1, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '001' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1 ) B ON A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1 ) AA INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.STEP1, A.STEP2, COALESCE(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM (SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B ON A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1 AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2 ) BB ON AA.STEP1 = BB.STEP1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(CNT_STEP3) AS CNT_STEP3, NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.RCODE_STEP1, A.RCODE_STEP2, A.RCODE_STEP3, COALESCE(A.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP3, COALESCE(B.CD_DESC, 'Etc') AS NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3 ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT STEP1, STEP2, STEP3, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '003' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) B ON A.RCODE_STEP1 = B.STEP1 AND A.RCODE_STEP2 = B.STEP2 AND A.RCODE_STEP3 = B.STEP3 ) C GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, NM_STEP3 ) CC ON BB.STEP1 = CC.RCODE_STEP1 AND BB.STEP2 = CC.RCODE_STEP2 ORDER BY AA.STEP1, BB.STEP2, CC.RCODE_STEP3

SELECT CUST_DOMAIN DOMAIN_NM , SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN (SEND_RCODE != '000' AND RCODE_STEP1 = '002') THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_CNT FROM NEO_AR_DOMAINLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY CUST_DOMAIN ORDER BY SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RESP_TIME , SUCC_CNT , OPEN_CNT , CLICK_CNT , VALID_CNT , BLOCK_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Y.RESP_TIME) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND SEND_RCODE = '000' ) X, ( SELECT RESP_TIME, COALESCE(SUM(OPEN_CNT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(CLICK_CNT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(VALID_CNT),0) AS VALID_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(BLOCK_CNT),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , COALESCE(SUM(AA.RESP_AR_AMT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, 0 AS CLICK_CNT, 0 AS VALID_CNT , COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN AA.BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN AA.RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG AA WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , 0 AS OPEN_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(AA.CLICK_AR_AMT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(AA.VALID_AR_AMT),0) AS VALID_CNT, 0 AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG AA WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') ) GROUP BY RESP_TIME ) Y ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO , NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO , NEO_SUBTASK.SEND_DT , NEO_TASK.TASK_NM , NEO_SEGMENT.SEG_NM , NEO_CAMPAIGN.CAMP_NM , COALESCE(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) AS TOT_CNT , COALESCE(SUM((CASE WHEN NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT END)),0) AS SUC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG , NEO_SUBTASK , NEO_TASK , NEO_SEGMENT , NEO_CAMPAIGN WHERE NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = NEO_TASK.TASK_NO AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = NEO_SUBTASK.TASK_NO AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO = NEO_SUBTASK.SUB_TASK_NO AND NEO_TASK.SEG_NO = NEO_SEGMENT.SEG_NO AND NEO_TASK.CAMP_NO = NEO_CAMPAIGN.CAMP_NO AND
( NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = #{joinKey.taskNo} AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO = #{joinKey.subTaskNo} )
GROUP BY NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO , NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO , NEO_SUBTASK.SEND_DT , NEO_TASK.TASK_NM , NEO_SEGMENT.SEG_NM , NEO_CAMPAIGN.CAMP_NM ORDER BY NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO DESC, NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO DESC

SELECT A.STEP1 , A.STEP2 , COALESCE(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2 , A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND
( NEO_AR_SENDLOG.TASK_NO = #{joinKey.taskNo} AND NEO_AR_SENDLOG.SUB_TASK_NO = #{joinKey.subTaskNo} )
GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B ON A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1 AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2 ORDER BY A.STEP1, A.STEP2

SELECT A.TASK_NO , A.TASK_NM , B.CAMP_NM , C.SEG_NM , D.SEND_DT , D.END_DT , E.CD_NM CAMP_TY FROM NEO_TASK A , NEO_CAMPAIGN B , NEO_SEGMENT C , (SELECT TASK_NO, MIN(SEND_DT) AS SEND_DT, MAX(END_DT) AS END_DT FROM NEO_SUBTASK GROUP BY TASK_NO) D , (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C004' AND UILANG = #{uilang} AND USE_YN = 'Y') E WHERE A.CAMP_NO = B.CAMP_NO AND A.SEG_NO = C.SEG_NO AND A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO AND A.CAMP_TY = E.CD

SELECT SEND_CNT , SUCC_CNT , (SEND_CNT - SUCC_CNT) AS FAIL_CNT , OPEN_CNT , VALID_CNT , CLICK_CNT , BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) SEND_CNT , COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} ) A, ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(RESP_AR_AMT),0) OPEN_CNT , COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} ) B, ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CLICK_AR_AMT),0) CLICK_CNT , COALESCE(SUM(VALID_AR_AMT),0) VALID_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} ) D

SELECT A.STEP1 , A.STEP2 , COALESCE(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2 , A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B ON A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1 AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2 ORDER BY A.STEP1, A.STEP2

SELECT AA.STEP1 , AA.NM_STEP1 , AA.CNT_STEP1 , CASE WHEN AA.STEP1 = '001' THEN 6 ELSE 8 END STEP1_ROWSPAN , BB.STEP2 , BB.NM_STEP2 , BB.CNT_STEP2 , 1 STEP2_ROWSPAN , CC.RCODE_STEP3 AS STEP3 , COALESCE(CC.NM_STEP3,'') AS NM_STEP3 , COALESCE(CC.CNT_STEP3,0) AS CNT_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.STEP1, COALESCE(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP1, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP1 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '001' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1 ) B ON A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1 ) AA INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.STEP1, A.STEP2, COALESCE(B.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP2, A.CD_DESC AS NM_STEP2 FROM ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '002' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2 ) B ON A.STEP1 = B.RCODE_STEP1 AND A.STEP2 = B.RCODE_STEP2 ) BB ON AA.STEP1 = BB.STEP1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(CNT_STEP3) AS CNT_STEP3, NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT A.RCODE_STEP1, A.RCODE_STEP2, A.RCODE_STEP3, COALESCE(A.SEND_AR_AMT,0) AS CNT_STEP3, COALESCE(B.CD_DESC, 'Etc') AS NM_STEP3 FROM ( SELECT RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_AR_AMT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE SEND_RCODE != '000' AND TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3 ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT STEP1, STEP2, STEP3, CD_DESC FROM NEO_RCODE WHERE KIND = '003' AND UILANG = #{uilang} ) B ON A.RCODE_STEP1 = B.STEP1 AND A.RCODE_STEP2 = B.STEP2 AND A.RCODE_STEP3 = B.STEP3 ) C GROUP BY RCODE_STEP1, RCODE_STEP2, RCODE_STEP3, NM_STEP3 ) CC ON BB.STEP1 = CC.RCODE_STEP1 AND BB.STEP2 = CC.RCODE_STEP2 ORDER BY AA.STEP1, BB.STEP2, CC.RCODE_STEP3

SELECT CUST_DOMAIN DOMAIN_NM , SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN (SEND_RCODE != '000' AND RCODE_STEP1 = '002') THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS ERROR_CNT FROM NEO_AR_DOMAINLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} GROUP BY CUST_DOMAIN ORDER BY SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') AS SEND_TIME , COALESCE(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT), 0) AS SEND_CNT , COALESCE(SUM((CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT END)), 0) AS SUCC_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24')) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER () TOTAL_COUNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) B WHERE A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(A.SEND_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (B.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) END AS SEND_CNT , CASE WHEN SUM((CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT END)) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM((CASE WHEN A.SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN A.SEND_AR_AMT END)) END AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG A , ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) B WHERE A.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RESP_TIME , SUCC_CNT , OPEN_CNT , CLICK_CNT , VALID_CNT , BLOCK_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Y.RESP_TIME) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND SEND_RCODE = '000' ) X, ( SELECT RESP_TIME, COALESCE(SUM(OPEN_CNT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(CLICK_CNT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(VALID_CNT),0) AS VALID_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(BLOCK_CNT),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , COALESCE(SUM(AA.RESP_AR_AMT),0) AS OPEN_CNT, 0 AS CLICK_CNT, 0 AS VALID_CNT , COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN AA.BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN AA.RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.OPEN_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') RESP_TIME , 0 AS OPEN_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(AA.CLICK_AR_AMT),0) AS CLICK_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(AA.VALID_AR_AMT),0) AS VALID_CNT, 0 AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR((TO_DATE(AA.CLICK_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') + (BB.TZ_TERM/60)/24), 'YYYYMMDDHH24') ) GROUP BY RESP_TIME ) Y ) WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows}

SELECT SUCC_CNT, OPEN_CNT, CLICK_CNT, VALID_CNT, BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT SUM(SEND_AR_AMT) AS SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND SEND_RCODE = '000' ) X, ( SELECT SUM(OPEN_CNT) AS OPEN_CNT, SUM(CLICK_CNT) AS CLICK_CNT, SUM(VALID_CNT) AS VALID_CNT, SUM(BLOCK_CNT) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT SUM(AA.RESP_AR_AMT) AS OPEN_CNT, 0 AS CLICK_CNT, 0 AS VALID_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN AA.RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS OPEN_CNT, SUM(AA.CLICK_AR_AMT) AS CLICK_CNT, SUM(AA.VALID_AR_AMT) AS VALID_CNT, 0 AS BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG AA, ( SELECT USER_ID, TZ_TERM FROM NEO_USER A, NEO_TIMEZONE B WHERE A.TZ_CD = B.TZ_CD ) BB WHERE AA.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND AA.USER_ID = BB.USER_ID ) YY ) Y

SELECT A.CAMP_NM , A.REG_DT , B.DEPT_NM , C.USER_NM , D.CD_NM AS CAMP_TY FROM NEO_CAMPAIGN A, NEO_DEPT B, NEO_USER C, (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C004' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) D WHERE A.CAMP_NO = #{campNo} AND A.DEPT_NO = B.DEPT_NO AND A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.CAMP_TY = D.CD

SELECT TASK_NO , SEND_CNT , SUCC_CNT , OPEN_CNT , VALID_CNT , CLICK_CNT , BLOCK_CNT , SEND_REPEAT , TASK_NM , TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT A.TASK_NO , COALESCE(SEND_CNT,0) AS SEND_CNT , COALESCE(SUCC_CNT,0) AS SUCC_CNT , COALESCE(OPEN_CNT,0) AS OPEN_CNT , COALESCE(VALID_CNT,0) AS VALID_CNT , COALESCE(CLICK_CNT,0) AS CLICK_CNT , COALESCE(BLOCK_CNT,0) AS BLOCK_CNT , COALESCE(E.SEND_REPEAT,'000') AS SEND_REPEAT , E.TASK_NM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.TASK_NO DESC) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT TASK_NO, COALESCE(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) SEND_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TASK_NO, COALESCE(SUM(RESP_AR_AMT),0) OPEN_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TASK_NO, COALESCE(SUM(CLICK_AR_AMT),0) CLICK_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(VALID_AR_AMT),0) VALID_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) D ON A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO INNER JOIN NEO_TASK E ON A.TASK_NO = E.TASK_NO ORDER BY A.TASK_NO DESC ) TT WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT SUM(SEND_CNT) AS SEND_CNT , SUM(SUCC_CNT) AS SUCC_CNT , SUM(OPEN_CNT) AS OPEN_CNT , SUM(VALID_CNT) AS VALID_CNT , SUM(CLICK_CNT) AS CLICK_CNT , SUM(BLOCK_CNT) AS BLOCK_CNT FROM ( SELECT TASK_NO, COALESCE(SUM(SEND_AR_AMT),0) SEND_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN SEND_RCODE = '000' THEN SEND_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) SUCC_CNT FROM NEO_AR_SENDLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TASK_NO, COALESCE(SUM(RESP_AR_AMT),0) OPEN_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN BLOCKED_YN = 'Y' THEN RESP_AR_AMT ELSE 0 END),0) BLOCK_CNT FROM NEO_AR_RESPLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) B ON A.TASK_NO = B.TASK_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TASK_NO, COALESCE(SUM(CLICK_AR_AMT),0) CLICK_CNT, COALESCE(SUM(VALID_AR_AMT),0) VALID_CNT FROM NEO_AR_LINKLOG WHERE CAMP_NO = #{campNo} GROUP BY TASK_NO ) D ON A.TASK_NO = D.TASK_NO INNER JOIN NEO_TASK E ON A.TASK_NO = E.TASK_NO

SELECT SEND_DT , MAIL_FROM_NM , MAIL_FROM_EM , USER_ID , USER_NM , SEND_REPEAT , SEND_REPEAT_NM , TASK_NO , SUB_TASK_NO , TASK_NM , MAIL_TITLE , CUST_ID , CAMP_NO , CAMP_NM , CUST_EM , CUST_NM , SEND_RCODE , SEND_RCODE_NM , ATT_CNT , SERVICE_GB , CONT_FL_PATH , WEB_AGENT , WEB_AGENT_TYP , RESP_AMT , OPEN_DT , BIZKEY , RTY_NO , SEG_REAL , TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT MT1.SEND_DT , MT1.MAIL_FROM_NM , MT1.MAIL_FROM_EM , MT1.USER_ID , MT1.USER_NM , MT1.SEND_REPEAT , MT1.SEND_REPEAT_NM , MT1.TASK_NO , MT1.SUB_TASK_NO , MT1.TASK_NM , MT1.MAIL_TITLE , MT1.CUST_ID , MT1.CAMP_NO , MT1.CAMP_NM , MT1.CUST_EM , MT1.CUST_NM , MT1.SEND_RCODE , MT1.SEND_RCODE_NM , MT1.ATT_CNT , MT1.SERVICE_GB , MT1.CONT_FL_PATH , MT1.WEB_AGENT , MT1.WEB_AGENT_TYP , MT1.RESP_AMT , MT1.OPEN_DT , MT1.BIZKEY , MT1.RTY_NO , MT1.SEG_REAL , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MT1.SEND_DT DESC, MT1.CUST_ID, MT1.CUST_NM) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT T1.SEND_DT , T3.MAIL_FROM_NM , T3.MAIL_FROM_EM , T1.USER_ID , T5.USER_NM , T3.SEND_REPEAT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C017' AND CD = T3.SEND_REPEAT) SEND_REPEAT_NM , T1.TASK_NO , T1.SUB_TASK_NO , T3.TASK_NM , T3.MAIL_TITLE , T1.CUST_ID , T1.CAMP_NO , T6.CAMP_NM , T1.CUST_EM , T1.CUST_NM , T1.SEND_RCODE , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C035' AND CD = T1.SEND_RCODE) SEND_RCODE_NM , T3.ATT_CNT , '10' SERVICE_GB , T3.CONT_FL_PATH , COALESCE(T7.SOURCE_URL, '') WEB_AGENT , COALESCE(T7.SECU_ATT_TYP, '') WEB_AGENT_TYP , COALESCE(T8.RESP_AMT, 0) RESP_AMT , COALESCE(T8.OPEN_DT, '') OPEN_DT , T1.BIZKEY , COALESCE(T2.RTY_TASK_NO,0 ) RTY_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEO_SEGMENT_REAL WHERE SEG_NO = T3.SEG_NO) SEG_REAL FROM NEO_SENDLOG T1 INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK T2 ON (T1.TASK_NO = T2.TASK_NO AND T1.SUB_TASK_NO = T2.SUB_TASK_NO) INNER JOIN NEO_TASK T3 ON (T1.TASK_NO = T3.TASK_NO) INNER JOIN NEO_DEPT T4 ON (T1.DEPT_NO = T4.DEPT_NO) INNER JOIN NEO_USER T5 ON (T1.USER_ID = T5.USER_ID) INNER JOIN NEO_CAMPAIGN T6 ON (T1.CAMP_NO = T6.CAMP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN NEO_WEBAGENT T7 ON(T1.TASK_NO = T7.TASK_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN NEO_RESPLOG T8 ON (T1.TASK_NO = T8.TASK_NO AND T1.SUB_TASK_NO = T8.SUB_TASK_NO AND T1.DEPT_NO = T8.DEPT_NO AND T1.CAMP_NO = T8.CAMP_NO AND T1.CUST_ID = T8.CUST_ID AND T1.USER_ID = T8.USER_ID ) WHERE T1.RETRY_CNT = T1.MAX_RETRY_CNT
AND T1.SEND_DT >= CONCAT(#{searchStartDt}, '000000')
AND T1.SEND_DT < CONCAT( #{searchEndDt}, '240000')
AND T1.CAMP_NO = #{searchCampNo}
AND T1.CUST_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustId}, '%')
AND T1.CUST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustNm}, '%')
AND T1.CUST_EM = #{searchCustEm}
AND T1.SEND_RCODE = '000'
AND T1.SEND_RCODE != '000'
AND T5.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchUserNm},'%')
) MT1 ) TT WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT SEND_DT , MAIL_FROM_NM , MAIL_FROM_EM , USER_ID , USER_NM , SEND_REPEAT , SEND_REPEAT_NM , TASK_NO , SUB_TASK_NO , TASK_NM , MAIL_TITLE , CUST_ID , CAMP_NO , CAMP_NM , CUST_EM , CUST_NM , SEND_RCODE , SEND_RCODE_NM , ATT_CNT , SERVICE_GB , CONT_FL_PATH , WEB_AGENT , WEB_AGENT_TYP , RESP_AMT , OPEN_DT , BIZKEY , RTY_NO , SEG_REAL , TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT SEND_DT , MAIL_FROM_NM , MAIL_FROM_EM , USER_ID , USER_NM , SEND_REPEAT , SEND_REPEAT_NM , TASK_NO , SUB_TASK_NO , TASK_NM , MAIL_TITLE , CUST_ID , CAMP_NO , CAMP_NM , CUST_EM , CUST_NM , SEND_RCODE , SEND_RCODE_NM , ATT_CNT , SERVICE_GB , CONT_FL_PATH , WEB_AGENT , WEB_AGENT_TYP , RESP_AMT , OPEN_DT , BIZKEY , SEG_REAL , RTY_NO , CTNPOS , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SEND_DT DESC, CUST_ID, CUST_NM) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(Y.SDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') SEND_DT , X.SNAME MAIL_FROM_NM , X.SMAIL MAIL_FROM_EM , X.SID USER_ID , X.SNAME USER_NM , '099' SEND_REPEAT , '실시간' SEND_REPEAT_NM , X.TID TASK_NO , X.MID SUB_TASK_NO , C.TNM TASK_NM , Y.SUBJECT MAIL_TITLE , X.RID CUST_ID , X.TID CAMP_NO , C.TNM CAMP_NM , X.RMAIL CUST_EM , X.RNAME CUST_NM , X.RCODE SEND_RCODE , (SELECT CD_DESC FROM TS_RCODE WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND X.RCODE = RCODE ) SEND_RCODE_NM , ( ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile01 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile01 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile02 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile02 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile03 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile03 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile04 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile04 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile05 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile05 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) ) ATT_CNT , '20' SERVICE_GB , C.CONTENTS_PATH CONT_FL_PATH , (SELECT COALESCE(SOURCE_URL, '') FROM TS_WEBAGENT WHERE TID = X.TID) WEB_AGENT , (SELECT COALESCE(SECU_ATT_TYP, '') FROM TS_WEBAGENT WHERE TID = X.TID) WEB_AGENT_TYP , COALESCE(L.RSID, 0 ) RESP_AMT , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(COALESCE(L.RSDATE, ''), '/', ''), ':', ''), ' ' ,'') OPEN_DT , X.BIZKEY , 0 SEG_REAL , COALESCE(Y.RTY_MID, 0) RTY_NO , Y.CTNPOS AS CTNPOS FROM TS_RESULTLOG X LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_SERVICETYP C ON (X.TID = C.TID) INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE Y ON (X.MID = Y.MID AND X.SUBID= Y.SUBID AND X.TID = Y.TID ) INNER JOIN (SELECT MID, MAX(SUBID) SUBID FROM TS_MAILQUEUE GROUP BY MID) D ON ( X.MID = D.MID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_WEBAGENT T ON ( X.TID = T.TID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_RESPONSELOG L ON ( X.MID = L.MID AND X.SUBID = L.SUBID AND X.RID = L.RID ) WHERE 1=1
AND X.STIME >= TO_CHAR(CAST(#{searchStartDt} AS DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND X.STIME < TO_CHAR((CAST(#{searchEndDt} AS DATE) + integer '1'), 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND C.CAMP_NO = #{searchCampNo}
AND X.RID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustId}, '%')
AND X.RNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustNm}, '%')
AND X.RMAIL = #{searchCustEm}
AND CAST(X.RCODE AS INTEGER) = 1
AND CAST(X.RCODE AS INTEGER) > 1
AND X.SNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchUserNm},'%')
) RR WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT MID FROM TS_MAILQUEUE_TEST RT WHERE RR.SUB_TASK_NO = RT.MID) ) TT WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT T1.SEND_DT , T3.MAIL_FROM_NM , T3.MAIL_FROM_EM , T1.USER_ID , T5.USER_NM , T3.SEND_REPEAT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG=#{uilang} AND CD_GRP='C017' AND CD=T3.SEND_REPEAT) SEND_REPEAT_NM , T1.TASK_NO , T1.SUB_TASK_NO , T3.TASK_NM , T3.MAIL_TITLE , T1.CUST_ID , T1.CAMP_NO , T6.CAMP_NM , T1.CUST_EM , T1.CUST_NM , T1.SEND_RCODE , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG=#{uilang} AND CD_GRP='C035' AND CD=T1.SEND_RCODE) SEND_RCODE_NM , T3.ATT_CNT , '10' SERVICE_GB , T3.CONT_FL_PATH , (SELECT COALESCE(SOURCE_URL, '') FROM NEO_WEBAGENT WHERE TASK_NO = T1.TASK_NO) WEB_AGENT FROM NEO_SENDLOG T1 , NEO_SUBTASK T2 , NEO_TASK T3 , NEO_DEPT T4 , NEO_USER T5 , NEO_CAMPAIGN T6 WHERE T1.TASK_NO = T2.TASK_NO AND T1.SUB_TASK_NO = T2.SUB_TASK_NO AND T1.TASK_NO = T3.TASK_NO AND T1.DEPT_NO = T4.DEPT_NO AND T1.USER_ID = T5.USER_ID AND T1.CAMP_NO = T6.CAMP_NO
AND T1.SEND_DT > CONCAT( #{searchStartDt} , '000000')
AND T1.SEND_DT < CONCAT(#{searchEndDt} ,'240000')
AND T1.CAMP_NO = #{searchCampNo}
AND T1.CUST_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustId}, '%')
AND T1.CUST_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustNm}, '%')
AND T1.CUST_EM = #{searchCustEm}
AND T1.SEND_RCODE = '000'
AND T1.SEND_RCODE != '000'
AND T5.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchUserNm},'%')
ORDER BY T1.SEND_DT

SELECT SEND_DT , MAIL_FROM_NM , MAIL_FROM_EM , USER_ID , USER_NM , SEND_REPEAT , SEND_REPEAT_NM , TASK_NO , SUB_TASK_NO , TASK_NM , MAIL_TITLE , CUST_ID , CAMP_NO , CAMP_NM , CUST_EM , CUST_NM , SEND_RCODE , SEND_RCODE_NM , ATT_CNT , SERVICE_GB , CONT_FL_PATH , WEB_AGENT , WEB_AGENT_TYP , RESP_AMT , OPEN_DT , BIZKEY , SEG_REAL , RTY_NO , CTNPOS FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(Y.SDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') SEND_DT , X.SNAME MAIL_FROM_NM , X.SMAIL MAIL_FROM_EM , X.SID USER_ID , X.SNAME USER_NM , '099' SEND_REPEAT , '실시간' SEND_REPEAT_NM , X.TID TASK_NO , X.MID SUB_TASK_NO , C.TNM TASK_NM , Y.SUBJECT MAIL_TITLE , X.RID CUST_ID , X.TID CAMP_NO , C.TNM CAMP_NM , X.RMAIL CUST_EM , X.RNAME CUST_NM , X.RCODE SEND_RCODE , (SELECT CD_DESC FROM TS_RCODE WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND X.RCODE = RCODE ) SEND_RCODE_NM , ( ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile01 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile01 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile02 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile02 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile03 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile03 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile04 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile04 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) + ( CASE WHEN coalesce( CASE WHEN Y.attachfile05 IS NULL THEN '' ELSE Y.attachfile05 END , '' ) = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) ) ATT_CNT , '20' SERVICE_GB , C.CONTENTS_PATH CONT_FL_PATH , (SELECT COALESCE(SOURCE_URL, '') FROM TS_WEBAGENT WHERE TID = X.TID) WEB_AGENT , (SELECT COALESCE(SECU_ATT_TYP, '') FROM TS_WEBAGENT WHERE TID = X.TID) WEB_AGENT_TYP , COALESCE(L.RSID, 0 ) RESP_AMT , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(COALESCE(L.RSDATE, ''), '/', ''), ':', ''), ' ' ,'') OPEN_DT , X.BIZKEY , 0 SEG_REAL , COALESCE(Y.RTY_MID, 0) RTY_NO , Y.CTNPOS AS CTNPOS FROM TS_RESULTLOG X INNER JOIN TS_SERVICETYP C ON (X.TID = C.TID) INNER JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE Y ON (X.MID = Y.MID AND X.SUBID= Y.SUBID AND X.TID = Y.TID ) INNER JOIN (SELECT MID, MAX(SUBID) SUBID FROM TS_MAILQUEUE GROUP BY MID) D ON ( X.MID = D.MID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_WEBAGENT T ON ( X.TID = T.TID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_RESPONSELOG L ON ( X.MID = L.MID AND X.SUBID = L.SUBID AND X.RID = L.RID ) WHERE 1=1
AND X.STIME >= TO_CHAR(CAST(#{searchStartDt} AS DATE), 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND X.STIME < TO_CHAR((CAST(#{searchEndDt} AS DATE) + integer '1'), 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND C.CAMP_NO = #{searchCampNo}
AND X.RID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustId}, '%')
AND X.RNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCustNm}, '%')
AND X.RMAIL = #{searchCustEm}
AND CAST(X.RCODE AS INTEGER) = 1
AND CAST(X.RCODE AS INTEGER) > 1
AND X.SNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchUserNm},'%')
) RR WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT MID FROM TS_MAILQUEUE_TEST RT WHERE RR.SUB_TASK_NO = RT.MID) ORDER BY SEND_DT DESC, CUST_ID, CUST_NM

SELECT CAMP_NO , CAMP_NM , SEND_DT , TASK_COUNT , TASK_NM , SEND_REPEAT_NM , USER_ID , USER_NM , DEPT_NO , CAMP_REG_DT , TASK_REG_DT , WORK_STATUS_NM , TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT T2.TID CAMP_NO , (SELECT CAMP_NM FROM NEO_CAMPAIGN WHERE CAMP_NO = T2.CAMP_NO) CAMP_NM , TO_CHAR(T3.SDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') SEND_DT , T1.TASK_COUNT , T2.EMAIL_SUBJECT TASK_NM , '실시간' SEND_REPEAT_NM , T3.SID USER_ID , COALESCE((SELECT USER_NM FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = T3.SID), (SELECT USER_NM FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = T2.SID)) USER_NM , COALESCE(T3.DEPT_NO, T2.DEPT_NO) DEPT_NO , T2.REG_DT CAMP_REG_DT , TO_CHAR( T3.CDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') TASK_REG_DT , (SELECT CD_DESC FROM TS_RCODE WHERE RCODE = T4.RCODE) WORK_STATUS_NM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T2.REG_DT DESC, T1.MID DESC) SEQ , COUNT(1) OVER() TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT C.TID , MAX(Y.MID) MID, COUNT(*) TASK_COUNT FROM TS_MAILQUEUE Y LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_SERVICETYP C ON C.TID = Y.TID WHERE COALESCE(Y.STATUS , '1' ) > '0' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT AA.MID FROM TS_MAILQUEUE_TEST AA WHERE AA.MID = Y.MID )
AND Y.SDATE >= TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchStartDt},'000000'),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND Y.SDATE <= TO_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(#{searchEndDt},'235959'),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
AND C.CAMP_NO = #{searchCampNo}
AND Y.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchUserId}, '%')
AND Y.DEPT_NO = #{searchDeptNo}
GROUP BY C.TID ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TS_SERVICETYP T2 ON T1.TID= T2.TID JOIN TS_MAILQUEUE T3 ON T1.MID = T3.MID JOIN TS_RESULTLOG T4 ON T1.MID = T4.MID ) TT WHERE SEQ BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*#{rows}+1 AND #{page}*#{rows} ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT T1.TASK_NO , T1.TASK_NM , T2.SUB_TASK_NO , T1.MAIL_TITLE , T1.ATT_CNT , T1.CONT_FL_PATH , T1.SEG_NO , T3.SEG_NM , T1.CAMP_NO , T4.CAMP_NM , T1.USER_ID , T1.MAIL_FROM_NM , T1.MAIL_FROM_EM , T1.STATUS , (SELECT MAX(CD_NM) FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C023' AND CD = T1.STATUS) STATUS_NM , T2.WORK_STATUS , (SELECT MIN(SEND_DT) FROM NEO_SUBTASK WHERE TASK_NO = T1.TASK_NO AND WORK_STATUS NOT IN ('000','001','002','201','202','203', '204') AND SEND_TEST_YN = 'N') SEND_TERM_START_DT , T1.SEND_TERM_END_DT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C101' AND CD = T2.WORK_STATUS) WORK_STATUS_NM , (SELECT CD_DTL FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C101' AND CD = T2.WORK_STATUS) WORK_STATUS_DTL , T2.SEND_DT , T2.END_DT , T1.SEND_REPEAT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = #{uilang} AND CD_GRP = 'C017' AND CD = T1.SEND_REPEAT) SEND_REPEAT_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NEO_SUBTASK WHERE TASK_NO = T1.TASK_NO) MAIL_CNT , COALESCE(T2.RTY_TASK_NO, 0 ) RTY_NO , T1.REG_DT TASK_REG_DT , COALESCE(T1.SEND_TERM_LOOP, '0' ) SEND_TERM_LOOP , (SELECT CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE UILANG = '000' AND CD_GRP = 'C019' AND CD = T1.SEND_TERM_LOOP_TY) SEND_TERM_LOOP_TY_NM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEO_SEGMENT_RETRY WHERE SEG_NO = T1.SEG_NO) SEG_RETRY , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEO_ATTACH WHERE TASK_NO = T1.TASK_NO) ATTCH_CNT , (SELECT COALESCE(SECU_ATT_TYP, '') FROM NEO_WEBAGENT WHERE TASK_NO = T1.TASK_NO) WEB_AGENT_TYP , (SELECT COALESCE(SOURCE_URL, '') FROM NEO_WEBAGENT WHERE TASK_NO = T1.TASK_NO) WEB_AGENT , T3.CREATE_TY SEG_CREATE_TY FROM NEO_TASK T1 INNER JOIN NEO_SUBTASK T2 ON ( T1.TASK_NO = T2.TASK_NO AND T1.TASK_NO = #{taskNo} AND T2.SUB_TASK_NO = #{subTaskNo} ) INNER JOIN NEO_SEGMENT T3 ON ( T1.SEG_NO = T3.SEG_NO ) INNER JOIN NEO_CAMPAIGN T4 ON ( T1.CAMP_NO = T4.CAMP_NO) WHERE T1.TASK_NO = #{taskNo}
